resources.description: According to the characteristics of the class of Fundamentals of Compiling, combining with actual experience in teaching, the question-based group-teaching method is adopted in the teaching of Fundamentals of Compiling. The question-based group-teaching is a method in which students are firstly grouped then questions are given to them. Raising solving questions in groups, students can participate in the teaching as a member of the group, which would help to achieve good teaching outcome enhancing students’ interests and knowledge absorption.
resources.name: Application of Question-based Group-teaching in the Course Teaching of "Fundamentals of Compiling"

name: application-of-question-based-group-teaching-in-the-course-teaching-of-fundamentals-of-compiling
